long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Alchemist Search" is an artistic search tool that utilizes open source code and animation solely through CSS. The animation depicts an imaginary laboratory setting, reminiscent of an alchemist's workspace.

In addition to its artistic and design aspects, there is a search box at the center of the page 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Alchemist Search Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms Of Use: https://www.tritechnix.com/mini-cursor-follower/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.tritechnix.com/privacy-policy
About-us: https://www.tritechnix.com
Contact-us: https://www.tritechnix.com
